content: {"name": "Hillsborough Township C.A.N.  (Community Assistance Network) Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Hillsborough Township Municipal Complex\n- Requires a lease or morguage statement to proof address.\n", "email": "", "url": "http://www.hillsborough-nj.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "379 South Branch Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Hillsborough Township", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08844", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.5089476, "longitude": -74.6826227}, "phones": [{"number": "(908) 369-3880", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Completed application"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}]}
